alert.note: Alert for Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 1:41PM MST until March 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 8000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory above 8000 feet this evening, additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with localized areas up to 20 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
